query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pacientes) as total_pacientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atendimentos) as total_atendimentos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_usuarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_credentials) as usuarios_com_login,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit_log) as registros_auditoria;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pacientes) as total_pacientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atendimentos) as total_atendimentos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_usuarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_credentials) as usuarios_com_login,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit_log) as registros_auditoria;
